column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Baking a cake is so much fun because cakes always mark a celebration .
#text=I ca n't think of a time that I baked a cake just to have as dessert with dinner .
#text=It 's so exciting picking out the flavors because I only have cake in moderation .
#text=When I make chocolate cake , it 's actually a vegan recipe !
#text=There 's no eggs or butter but it 's the best tasting one I 've ever had .
#text=I just dump flour , sugar , cocoa , and salt in a big bowl .
#text=Then combine apple cider vinegar and baking soda to give the cake a rise .
#text=And the best frosting for the cake is more chocolate !
#text=Different people prefer different types of frosting .
#text=Some -LRB- myself included -RRB- like a dark , rich chocolate and some like a lighter , milk chocolate taste .
#text=I whip butter and powdered sugar together and start adding cocoa .
#text=When the frosting starts getting thick and dark brown , I add a spoonful of milk at a time while the mixer whips up a heavenly confection .
#text=After the cakes have baked and cooled , I frost and decorate them .
#text=I can barely wait to go have the party and eat the cake !
